00f65940fd4005e246950933fa3facb2b4763af7.query:
INSERT INTO categories (board_id, category_name, version, source, families)
        VALUES ($1, $2, 1, $3, $4)
        RETURNING id

046804e8a1ed93ea44d70600d2045ce8e071d286.query:
INSERT INTO user_relations (from_user, to_user, kind) VALUES ($1, $2, $3::text::user_relation_kind)
        on CONFLICT(from_user, to_user) DO UPDATE set kind=$3::text::user_relation_kind

0606599be911fb20d416fd98e56aabe786139dcb.query:
WITH replies AS (
            SELECT abf.value AS id, abf.article_id, (categories.families && '{衛星}') AS is_satellite
        FROM article_bond_fields abf
            INNER JOIN articles ON articles.id = abf.article_id
            INNER JOIN categories ON categories.id = articles.category_id
        WHERE abf.value = ANY($1))
        SELECT id, COUNT(DISTINCT article_id) as "count!", is_satellite as "is_satellite!" FROM replies
        GROUP BY id, is_satellite

08a2f4be6bf7e693d0b1150fa2fea6dc6d023999.query:
SELECT parties.*, boards.board_name as "board_name?" FROM parties
        LEFT JOIN boards on boards.id = parties.board_id
            WHERE parties.board_id = $1

08fa6d03c815aa9a35a6c9864bfa69578d82647c.query:
INSERT INTO favorite_articles (user_id, article_id)
        VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING id

0bf301c69184642edf8e8728b7e2c3263a5fdf07.query: UPDATE articles SET energy = energy + $1 WHERE id = $2

10ec31effdc0010f1b86c371d2bc454d54456f27.query:
WITH metas AS (SELECT
                articles.*,
                users.user_name AS author_name,
                boards.board_name,
                categories.category_name,
                categories.source AS category_source,
                categories.families AS category_families
            FROM
                articles
                INNER JOIN users ON articles.author_id = users.id
                INNER JOIN boards ON articles.board_id = boards.id
                INNER JOIN categories ON articles.category_id = categories.id
            WHERE ($1
                AND NOT categories.families && $2)
                OR (NOT $1
                AND categories.families && $2))
            SELECT metas.*, favorite_articles.create_time AS favorite_create_time FROM metas 
        INNER JOIN favorite_articles ON metas.id = favorite_articles.article_id
        WHERE favorite_articles.user_id = $3

115e3162f3fac9f2f805df118d1ed1a4b4b53abc.query:
SELECT a.id FROM articles a WHERE EXISTS (
                        SELECT 1 FROM article_string_fields f
                        WHERE f.name = $1 AND f.article_id = a.id AND f.value ~ $2
                    ) AND a.id = ANY($3)

14db105952e6d3dfd3dbc4a26d43aa793ed33395.query:
INSERT INTO article_string_fields
                        (article_id, name, value)
                        VALUES ($1, $2, $3)

296ad24a0508a61e62dd39d5ed2ed1235a88caa1.query:
SELECT n.*, users.user_name as user2_name, boards.board_name, a1.title as article1_title, a2.title as article2_title
        FROM notifications n
        LEFT JOIN users on n.user2_id = users.id
        LEFT JOIN boards on n.board_id = boards.id
        LEFT JOIN articles a1 on n.article1_id = a1.id
        LEFT JOIN articles a2 on n.article2_id = a2.id
        WHERE user_id = $1 AND ($2 OR NOT n.read)

29e275a7248d92596c03596eb571e3e7aed48fa6.query:

        WHERE article_id = $1;

2b091fd60397645003da711e6a7efe070c7133f2.query: INSERT INTO signup_tokens (email, token, inviter_id) VALUES ($1, $2, $3)

2d680e691d71f2259578f9894d5b22d3ff786030.query: SELECT *, 0::bigint as "popularity!" FROM boards WHERE id = $1

2e133fb70b6fb85f9d2f9d6cd8c64fd374727537.query:
WITH metas AS (SELECT
                users.id,
                users.user_name,
                users.sentence,
                users.energy,
                users.introduction,
                users.gender,
                users.job,
                users.city,
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    to_user = users.id
                    AND (kind = 'hate'
                    OR kind = 'openly_hate')) AS "hated_count!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    to_user = users.id
                    AND (kind = 'follow'
                    OR kind = 'openly_follow')) AS "followed_count!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    from_user = users.id
                    AND (kind = 'hate'
                    OR kind = 'openly_hate')) AS "hating_count!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    from_user = users.id
                    AND (kind = 'follow'
                    OR kind = 'openly_follow')) AS "following_count!"
            FROM users) SELECT * FROM metas WHERE metas.id = $1

3a80771dae3b3fd0111e34c902e235e890568555.query:
WITH metas AS (SELECT
                articles.*,
                users.user_name AS author_name,
                boards.board_name,
                categories.category_name,
                categories.source AS category_source,
                categories.families AS category_families
            FROM
                articles
                INNER JOIN users ON articles.author_id = users.id
                INNER JOIN boards ON articles.board_id = boards.id
                INNER JOIN categories ON articles.category_id = categories.id
            WHERE ($1
                AND NOT categories.families && $2)
                OR (NOT $1
                AND categories.families && $2))
            SELECT 
        DISTINCT metas.*, abf.article_id as from, abf.value as to,
        abf.energy as bond_energy, abf.name, abf.id as bond_id
         FROM metas 
        INNER JOIN article_bond_fields abf on metas.id = abf.value
        WHERE abf.article_id = $3
        AND ($4 OR category_name = ANY($5))
        ORDER BY create_time DESC

859975baf1436ec51c67f4e1b444a7e864d7a6cf.query:
WITH metas AS (SELECT
                articles.*,
                users.user_name AS author_name,
                boards.board_name,
                categories.category_name,
                categories.source AS category_source,
                categories.families AS category_families
            FROM
                articles
                INNER JOIN users ON articles.author_id = users.id
                INNER JOIN boards ON articles.board_id = boards.id
                INNER JOIN categories ON articles.category_id = categories.id
            WHERE ($1
                AND NOT categories.families && $2)
                OR (NOT $1
                AND categories.families && $2))
            SELECT * FROM metas 
        WHERE board_name = $3 AND ($5 OR id < $6)
        ORDER BY create_time DESC
        LIMIT $4

913389ee51adffa0340e23bc44566f8e12ff4352.query:
WITH metas AS (SELECT
                users.id,
                users.user_name,
                users.sentence,
                users.energy,
                users.introduction,
                users.gender,
                users.job,
                users.city,
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    to_user = users.id
                    AND (kind = 'hate'
                    OR kind = 'openly_hate')) AS "hated_count!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    to_user = users.id
                    AND (kind = 'follow'
                    OR kind = 'openly_follow')) AS "followed_count!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    from_user = users.id
                    AND (kind = 'hate'
                    OR kind = 'openly_hate')) AS "hating_count!",
                (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(*)
                FROM
                    user_relations
                WHERE
                    from_user = users.id
                    AND (kind = 'follow'
                    OR kind = 'openly_follow')) AS "following_count!"
            FROM users) SELECT * FROM metas WHERE metas.user_name = $1

a662136e979f618508059dafb8ce52aafefea206.query:
WITH metas AS (SELECT
                articles.*,
                users.user_name AS author_name,
                boards.board_name,
                categories.category_name,
                categories.source AS category_source,
                categories.families AS category_families
            FROM
                articles
                INNER JOIN users ON articles.author_id = users.id
                INNER JOIN boards ON articles.board_id = boards.id
                INNER JOIN categories ON articles.category_id = categories.id
            WHERE ($1
                AND NOT categories.families && $2)
                OR (NOT $1
                AND categories.families && $2))
            SELECT * FROM metas 
        WHERE ($3 OR board_name = $4)
        AND ($5 OR author_name = $6)
        AND ($7 OR category_id = $8)
        AND ($9 OR create_time < $10)
        AND ($11 OR create_time > $12)
        AND ($13 OR title ~ $14)
        ORDER BY create_time DESC

d6bfba029661e5c2f01b44f6544706e894f7716c.query:
WITH metas AS (SELECT
                articles.*,
                users.user_name AS author_name,
                boards.board_name,
                categories.category_name,
                categories.source AS category_source,
                categories.families AS category_families
            FROM
                articles
                INNER JOIN users ON articles.author_id = users.id
                INNER JOIN boards ON articles.board_id = boards.id
                INNER JOIN categories ON articles.category_id = categories.id
            WHERE ($1
                AND NOT categories.families && $2)
                OR (NOT $1
                AND categories.families && $2))
            SELECT 
        DISTINCT metas.*, abf.article_id as from, abf.value as to,
        abf.energy as bond_energy, abf.name, abf.id as bond_id
         FROM metas 
        INNER JOIN article_bond_fields abf ON metas.id = abf.article_id
        WHERE abf.value = $3
        AND ($4 OR category_name = ANY($5))
        ORDER BY create_time DESC
